Title: Relates to increasing the penalty for a moving violation which results in the serious bodily injury or death of another person
Summary: Provides a minimum penalty of $300 for a moving violation which results in the serious bodily injury or death of another person.
LawCode: Amd ยง1800, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the penalty for a moving violation which results in the serious bodily injury or death of another person
